product_name: SRAM X7 3x9 Dual-Pull Front Derailleur - Low Clamp
long_description: The low-mount SRAM X7 front derailleur delivers precise, dependable front shifts for your 3x9 mountain bike drivetrain. Constructed out of chrome-plated steel for stiff responsiveness and resilient, trail-ready performance. Designed for use with 3x9 cranksets; max ring capacity of 44 teeth. Low-mount clamp fits 31.8 or 34.9 seat tubes (adapter included). Can be set up with top-pull or bottom-pull cable routing.
short_description: The low-mount SRAM X7 front derailleur delivers precise, dependable front shifts for your 3x9 mountain bike drivetrain.
